name: Beatdown! (Skill Card)
text:
Kaiba / Skill
[ACTIVATION]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[EFFECT]
If you control a Level 5 or higher monster, you can activate this Skill.
All monsters you currently control gain 300 ATK for each Level 5 or higher monster you control. 
At the end of your turn, flip this card over.
